title: ISic001660. I.Sicily inscription 001660
body:
Facsimile Images

1ΟΔΑΜΟΣ
2ΤΩΝΛΙΛΥΒΑΙΙΤΑΝ
3ΔΙΟΓΝΗΤΟΝ
4ΔΑΜΑΤΡΙΟΥΜΗΓΑ[.]
5.........

Apparatus criticus

text checked against photograph

English translation

The people of the Lilybaitani honour Diognetos Megas, son of Damatrios as benefactor

commentary

bibliography
